title: REBUY | Buy & Sell Second-hand mobile online
introduction: REBUY is a second-hand online mobile store to buy & sell
features: Single Page Application with mobile, tab & pc responsive project.
Full-stack project with three different authorizations Buyer, Seller & Admin with JOT token and private routing to secure route from the unwanted users.
Specific dashboard access for the different authorized users for secure & better UX.
Secure stripe payment system for Buyers to buy a product online.

title: WANDERLUST | Tour guide booking web app
introduction: WANDURLUST is a tour guide booking app
features: Full stack project with mobile, tab & pc responsiveness added for a better UX.
Manual user authentication and also Google authentication was added for a quick & hassle-free sign-in for users.
A customer review section was added to get feedback from users and to understand which tour service is suitable for the user.

title: EDEMY | Online learning platform
introduction: EDEMY is a online learning platform app
features: Course info & Course details can find easily for better UX.
Manual user authentication and also Google & Github authentication were added for a quick & hassle-free sign-in for users.
Have premium access to get all features for a course.
Download the pdf to share & save the information to the user's device.
